title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, February 18, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of Toni Morrison (1931). Her first novel, “The Bluest Eye,” was published when she was 38 years old, a story about a black girl who wanted blue eyes.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
